doc.field: Records of the Office of the President (Dr. James McNaughton Hester)
Records of the Office of the President (Dr. James McNaughton Hester)

The facilities and services series consists of 17 linear inches arranged according to Hester's original numbering system. This series contains files on many of the University buildings. Materials include correspondence, renovation plans, and attempts at finding funds for new buildings.

Boxes 42 and 43 contain almost exclusively material about Bobst Library. Researchers will find correspondence with contractors, neighborhood residents, major contributors, and library namesake Elmer H. Bobst, among other materials relating to the library's construction. Box 44 continues files on special services of the library such as food service and security.
Records of the Office of the President (Dr. James McNaughton Hester)
